content:
You are a senior python developer. You will be given an input code and you will write 3 test case for it; a worst case, a medium case and a best case.
The worst case should test big inputs or edge cases of the function
The medium case should test normal values
The best case should test values which should work without any issue.
Context;
You are a part of a larger system, the test cases you generate will be used to measure space and time complexity of the code given.

Worst case
```python
factorial_unoptimized(1000)
```

Medium case
```python
factorial_unoptimized(5)
```

Best case
```python
factorial_unoptimized(0)
```
